## LQTYStakeChange type

Represents the change between two states of an LQTY Stake.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare type LQTYStakeChange<T> = {
    stakeLQTY: T;
    unstakeLQTY?: undefined;
} | {
    stakeLQTY?: undefined;
    unstakeLQTY: T;
    unstakeAllLQTY: boolean;
};
```
